name: gqcoffee
description: gqcoffee is a smart loading script for loading coffee scripts. all coffee scripts in the given folder will be parsed live and attached to global.coffee. checkout test/test.js for examples

versions.1.0.17: fixing a bug where promise is not returned
versions.1.0.16: fixing a bug where promise is not returned
versions.1.0.10: updated with new syntax of Q 2.x
versions.1.0.9: fixed files with extension other than .coffee being recognized
versions.1.0.8: fixed cross os compatibility for windows
